trans-unit.source: Defines the interface for extending properties to other components in a container.
trans-unit.target: Definerer grensesnittet for å forlenge egenskaper i andre komponentene i en beholder.

trans-unit.source: An extender provider is a component that provides properties to other components.
trans-unit.target: En extender-leverandør er en komponent som inneholder egenskapene til andre komponenter.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control is an extender provider.

When you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, all other controls on the form have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> property added to their list of properties.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>styre til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, alle andre kontroller i skjemaet har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>egenskap som legges til i listen over egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Any component that provides extender properties must implement IExtenderProvider.
trans-unit.target: Noen komponent som inneholder Extender-egenskaper må implementere IExtenderProvider.

trans-unit.source: A visual designer can then call <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A> to determine which objects in a container should receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: Visuelle utformeren kan deretter kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A>å finne ut hvilke objekter i en beholder som skal motta egenskapene extender.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about extender providers, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om extender leverandører [slik: implementere en Extender leverandør](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Angir om dette objektet har extender egenskapene til det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: For more information on extender properties, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om extender Egenskaper [slik: implementere en Extender leverandør](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to receive the extender properties.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet har extender egenskapene til det angitte objektet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
